sentences.english: The men first tied a long rope to the front of the iron box.
sentences.chinese: 那些男士们首先把一条长的绳子绑在铁箱子的前面。

sentences.english: Nothing more than boxes of iron, too small for standing or lying.
sentences.chinese: 它们不比一个铁箱子大，站直或躺着都嫌太小。

sentences.english: While in 1999, development of iron box packaging has applied for the national patent.
sentences.chinese: 同时在99年开发研制的铁箱包装已申请国家专利。

sentences.english: The carpenter drilled holes in the wood.
sentences.chinese: 那些贼在铁箱上钻了个洞。

sentences.english: So the men tried to push the iron box to the village.
sentences.chinese: 因此男士们尝试推那铁箱子到乡村去。

sentences.english: The longer they pushed, the faster the iron box moved.
sentences.chinese: 他们推越久，那个铁箱子就移动得越快。

sentences.english: The thieves drilled a hole in the iron box.
sentences.chinese: 那些贼在铁箱上钻了个洞。

sentences.english: The iron box slowly began to move.
sentences.chinese: 那个铁箱子开始慢慢地移动了。

sentences.english: Donated an old iron casket that he had never been able to sell.
sentences.chinese: 捐赠的旧铁箱子，他从来都不能出售。

sentences.english: The iron box on wheels did just what the wise man thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 那个有轮的铁箱子就如那个聪明人所想象的。

definition: pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
